Distracted.name: Distracted
Distracted.description:
DD 10
The character is always last in turn order.

Latency.name: Latency
Latency.description:
DD 10
The character cannot use reaction.

Tired.name: Tired
Tired.description:
DD 10
The character cannot keep AP from one turn to another.

Leak.name: Leak
Leak.description:
DD 10
The character loses 10% of his flux.

Paralyze.name: Paralyze
Paralyze.description:
DD 15
The character movement is decreased by 2m/AP.

Dazed.name: Dazed
Dazed.description:
DD 15
The character max flux is decreased by 20%.

Exhausted.name: Exhausted
Exhausted.description:
DD 15
If the character uses more than 3 AP in one turn, he loses 1 HP.

Disability strength.name: Disability strength
Disability strength.description:
DD 15
The character strength is decreased by 2.

Disability agility.name: Disability agility
Disability agility.description:
DD 15
The character agility is decreased by 2.

Disability intelligence.name: Disability intelligence
Disability intelligence.description:
DD 15
The character intelligence is decreased by 2.

Disability willingness.name: Disability willingness
Disability willingness.description:
DD 15
The character willingness is decreased by 2.

Feeble.name: Feeble
Feeble.description:
DD 15
The character max HP is decreased by 20%.

Confused.name: Confused
Confused.description:
DD 20
The character AP is decreased by 2.

Wounded.name: Wounded
Wounded.description:
DD 20
The character combat values are decreased by 2.

Unconscious.name: Unconscious
Unconscious.description:
DD 20
The character falls into a coma.

Mutilated.name: Mutilated
Mutilated.description:
DD 20
The character loses a limb.

Bleeding.name: Bleeding
Bleeding.description:
DD 25
The character loses 1 HP per turn.

Agony.name: Agony
Agony.description:
DD 25
The character died at the end of the next turn.
